加.definition: to add; (math.) plus; to increase; to augment; (used before a disyllabic verb, often after an adverb like 不[bu4], 大[da4], 稍[shao1] etc, to indicate that the action applies to sth previously mentioned, as in 稍加改良[shao1jia1 gai3liang2] "make some minor improvements to (it)")

加上.definition: plus; to put in; to add; to add on; to add into; in addition; on top of that

加以.definition: in addition; moreover; (used before a disyllabic verb to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned); to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb); to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

加來海峽.definition: Strait of Calais in the English channel; Strait of Dover; Pas-de-Calais, département of France

加入.definition: to become a member; to join; to mix into; to participate in; to add in

加冠.definition: (in former times) coming-of-age ceremony at 20 years

加冰.definition: (of a drink) iced; on the rocks

加冰塊.definition: on the rocks; with ice; iced

加分.definition: bonus point; extra credit; to award bonus points; to earn extra points

加利福尼亞大學.pinyin: jiā lì fú ní yà dà xué

加利福尼亞大學洛杉磯分校.pinyin: jiā lì fú ní yà dà xué luò shān jī fēn xiào

加利福尼亞理工學院.pinyin: jiā lì fú ní yà lǐ gōng xué yuàn

加利西亞.definition: Galicia, province and former kingdom of northwest Spain

加加林.definition: Yuri Gagarin (1934-1968), Russian cosmonaut, first human in space

加勁.definition: to increase efforts; to make extra efforts

加勁兒.definition: erhua variant of 加勁|加劲[jia1 jin4]

加勒比國家聯盟.pinyin: jiā lēi bǐ guó jiā lián méng

加和.definition: to calculate the total; sum; total

加塞兒.definition: to push into a line out of turn; to cut in line; to jump the queue

加壓.definition: to pressurize; to pile on pressure

加大力度.definition: to try harder; to redouble one's efforts

加大努力.definition: to try harder; to redouble one's efforts

加大油門.definition: to accelerate; to step on the gas

加央.definition: Kangar city, capital of Perlis state 玻璃市[Bo1 li2 shi4], Malaysia

加委.definition: (of a government authority) to appoint (sb recommended by a subsidiary unit or a non-government organization)

加官.definition: to be promoted; additional government post

加官晉爵.definition: to confer a title an official position

加官進位.definition: promotion in official post and salary raise (idiom)

加官進祿.definition: promotion in official post and salary raise (idiom)

加密.definition: to encrypt; encryption; to protect with a password

加密套接字協議層.pinyin: jiā mì tào jiē zì xié yì céng

加封.definition: to seal up (a door with a paper seal, or a document); to confer an additional title on a nobleman

加封官階.definition: to confer additional titles on a nobleman

加州大學.definition: University of California (abbr. for 加利福尼亞大學|加利福尼亚大学[Jia1 li4 fu2 ni2 ya4 Da4 xue2])

加州理工學院.pinyin: jiā zhōu lǐ gōng xué yuàn
加州理工學院.definition: California Institute of Technology (Caltech); abbr. for 加利福尼亞理工學院|加利福尼亚理工学院

加強.definition: to reinforce; to strengthen; to enhance

加徵.definition: to levy an additional (tax or tariff)

加快.definition: to accelerate; to speed up; to hasten

加急.definition: to expedite; (of a delivery etc) expedited; express; urgent

加意.definition: paying special care; with particular attention

加拉太書.definition: Epistle of St Paul to the Galatians

加拉巴哥斯群島.pinyin: jiā lā bā gē sī qún dǎo

加拉帕戈斯群島.pinyin: jiā lā pà gē sī qún dǎo

加拉罕.definition: Leo Karakhan (1889-1937), Soviet ambassador to China 1921-26, executed in Stalin's 1937 purge

加拿大太平洋鐵路.pinyin: jiā ná dà tài píng yáng tiě lù

加拿大皇家.definition: HMCS (Her Majesty's Canadian Ship); prefix for Canadian Navy Vessels

加拿大皇家海軍.pinyin: jiā ná dà huáng jiā hǎi jūn

加拿大雁.definition: (bird species of China) cackling goose (Branta hutchinsii)

加持.definition: (Buddhism) (from Sanskrit "adhiṣṭhāna") blessings; (fig.) empowerment; boost; support; backing; to give one's blessing; to empower; (Tw) to hold an additional (passport etc)

加料.definition: to feed in; to load (raw material, supplies, fuel etc); to supply; fortified (with added material)

加權.definition: (math.) to weight; weighting; weighted (average, index etc)

加沃特.definition: gavotte, French dance popular in 18th century (loanword)

加沙.definition: Gaza (territory adjacent to Israel and Egypt)

加油.definition: to add oil; to top up with gas; to refuel; to accelerate; to step on the gas; (fig.) to make an extra effort; to cheer sb on

加油添醋.definition: to add interest (to a story); to sex up

加注.definition: to increase a bet; to raise (poker); to raise the stakes

加深印象.definition: to make a deeper impression on sb

加深理解.definition: to get a better grasp of sth

加添.definition: to add; to augment; to increase

加減乘除.definition: addition, subtraction, multiplication and division: the four basic operations of arithmetic

加減號.definition: plus-minus sign (±); plus and minus signs (+ and -)

加溫.definition: to heat; to add warmth; to raise temperature; fig. to stimulate

加滿.definition: to top up; to fill to the brim

加演.definition: to put on extra shows; to extend the run (of a show); to include an additional element in a show

加特林.definition: Gatling (name); Richard J. Gatling (1818-1903), inventor of the Gatling gun

加百列.definition: Gabriel (name); Archangel Gabriel of the Annunciation

加盟.definition: (of a nation) to join an alliance; (of an athlete) to join a sports team; (of an entrepreneur) to join a franchise; (of an actor) to join the cast of a movie; (of a recording artist) to sign with a label

加碼.definition: to ratchet up; to raise (expectations etc); to increase (a quota, a position in the market etc); to up the ante; (computing) to encode

加索爾.definition: Gasol (name); Pau Gasol (1980-), former Spanish professional basketball player (NBA); Marc Gasol (1985-), Spanish professional basketball player

加緊.definition: to intensify; to speed up; to step up

加總.definition: to aggregate; to calculate the total; aggregate; total

加繆.definition: Albert Camus (1913-1960), French-Algerian philosopher, author, and journalist

加茲尼省.definition: Ghazni or Ghaznah province of Afghanistan

加菲貓.definition: Garfield (comic strip cat created by Jim Davis)

加蓋.definition: to seal (with an official stamp); to stamp; (fig.) to ratify; to put a lid on (a cooking pot); to cap; to build an extension or additional story

加試.definition: to add material to an exam; supplementary exam

加購.definition: to buy (sth extra); to make an additional purchase

加賽.definition: (sports) to have an additional tie-breaking match or period of play; to have a playoff

加足馬力.definition: to go at full throttle; (fig.) to go all out; to kick into high gear

加辣.definition: to add spice; to make it spicy

加速.definition: to accelerate; to speed up; to expedite

加進.definition: to add; to mix in; to incorporate

加里寧格勒.definition: Kaliningrad, town on Baltic now in Russian republic; formerly Königsberg, capital of East Prussia

加里寧格勒州.pinyin: jiā lǐ níng gé lēi zhōu

加里曼丹.definition: Kalimantan (Indonesian part of the island of Borneo)

加里曼丹島.definition: Kalimantan island (Indonesian name for Borneo island)

加里波第.definition: Guiseppe Garibaldi (1807-1882), Italian military commander and politician

加重.definition: to make heavier; to emphasize; (of an illness etc) to become more serious; to aggravate (a bad situation); to increase (a burden, punishment etc)

加錢.definition: to pay extra; to pay more

加餐.definition: to have an extra meal; snack

加點.definition: to work extra hours; to do overtime
